Ordered list:

  1. First element
  2. Second element
  3. Third element

Unordered list

  • a

  • d

Nested Lists

  1. Element 1
    • Element 1.1
    • Element 1.2
  2. Element 2
    1. Element 2.1
    2. Element 2.2
    3. Element 2.3
    4. Element 2.4
    5. Element 2.5
